title: Sgpa
content:
I scored 7.6sgpa in chem cycle how hard is it score more than 8.5 sgpa in phy cycle 

Any tips to score well

comments.body:
I think according to seniors people usually find phy cycle harder than chem cycle 
I think it’s definitely going to be hard
As the credits are same you need (17-7.6) to get 8.5 gpa
For the people who have chem and C it’s going to be a bit better,  but physics and C feels a bit harder imo, for most of us the sgpa dropped regardless of the cycle in second sem.

Faisal sir's slides really helped me with physics.

As for EEE, the first two units are mostly numerical based so you gotta solve as many numericals as you can. The third unit is where you have to study a considerable amount of theory and solve quite a few numericals too. The numericals in the fourth unit are fairly easy but it is heavily theoretical. Me personally, I had to slog through notes and slides for the theoretical stuff.

Mechanical was the hardest for me partly because of a mid teacher so I had to slog through 936 slides before ESA.
